subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr moved into position for her second straight L.P.G.A. Tour victory, shooting a six-under 66 to take a two-stroke lead over Angela Stanford in the Bell Micro L.P.G.A. Classic in Mobile, Ala.
snippet: Cristie Kerr moved into position for her second straight L.P.G.A. Tour victory, shooting a six-under 66 to take a two-stroke lead over Angela Stanford in the Bell Micro L.P.G.A. Classic in Mobile, Ala.
